column5: This 5 bed, 3 full & 1 half bath home with pool and bonus room is located on the North Shore of beautiful Lake Travis. Located in a private cove directly across from a park, the community also has a gym, tennis courts, swimming pool, golf course, marina and lakefront bar/restaurant. With beautiful decks to watch the sunset this lakefront retreat is the place for you!
column8: Lake Travis Waterfront w/ Pool & Hot Tub
